titles: A proclamation, discharging the levying or transporting of souldiers vvithout licence
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the first of October, one thousand six hundred, and seventy four years.
Signed: Al. Gibson Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: creased and stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Scotland. --  Army --  Recruiting, enlistment, etc. --  Law and legislation --  Early works to 1800.
